scripts.build:html: npm run build & npx babel --no-babelrc -w ./test/renderer/html/index.js -o ./test/renderer/html/_index.js --presets=es2015 | npx webpack --watch --mode development --entry ./test/renderer/html/_index.js --output ./test/renderer/html/_bundle.js
scripts.build:react: npm run build & npx babel --no-babelrc -w ./test/renderer/react/app.js -o ./test/renderer/react/_app.js --presets=es2015,react & npx webpack --watch --mode development --entry ./test/renderer/react/_app.js --output ./test/renderer/react/_bundle.js
